03.My Project Journey

2024

Food Market Platform

Developed an food market site using Ruby on Rails and React. I built the user interface using TailwindCSS, integrated the Stripe payment gateway, and developed the backend using GraphQL and Ruby on Rails. I collaborated with designer, QA engineer, and front-end developer on the development.
